title: Ikoku Meiro no Croisée The Animation: Ongakkai "Récital"
original_name: 異国迷路のクロワーゼ The Animation 第 4.5 話 音楽会 "Récital"
opening_song: "Sekai wa Odoru yo, Kimi to. (Acoustic Version) [世界は踊るよ、君と。 (Acoustic Version)]" by Youmou to Ohana (羊毛とおはな)
ending_song: "Tooku Kimi e (遠く君へ)" by Megumi Nakajima
sinopse: According to the official website, episode 4.5 of of Ikoku Meiro no Croisée will be included in the third volume of the Blu-ray & DVD. The episode streamed for a limited time on ShowTime, the official online streaming site for Ikoku Meiro no Croisée.
